meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Deviate</kanji> from normal, everyday <kanji>product</kanji>s and buy lots of <vocabulary>gem</vocabulary>s and <vocabulary>treasure</vocabulary>s! Especially if you're buying presents. Normal stuff just isn't going to cut it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
